Who the hell are you?

An. Also referred to as Egg. Sometimes "fucking pothead" or "demon."

Made in Canada, currently living in Vietnam. Daddy was a fisherman and mommy raised me on pasta puttanesca.

I graduated with an illustration degree and now do standup comedy, which earned me a giant glass dildo earlier this year at a comedy competition. I dig horror movies and practical effects. My favourite video game is Bioshock and my favourite bands are Mr. Bungle, Melvins, and Primus. My buttermilk pancakes are amazing. No that wasn't a euphemism for anything. I make really good pancakes.

×

Behold.

Why "Brain Soup"?

  1. It's creamy and delicious but sounds horrifying to those who aren't open-minded.
  2. This is a place for me to dump the omnidirectional thoughts that swirl around in my ADHD-laden brain like an overseasoned soup.

Inspirational Quote

You'll 100% miss all the takes you don't chance.
